column2: Legacy Housing Corp. engages in the selling, building, and financing manufactured homes and tiny houses that are distributed through a network of independent retailers and company-owned stores and are sold directly to manufactured home communities. The company is headquartered in Bedford, Texas and currently employs 800 full-time employees. The firm offers its customers homes ranging in size from approximately 390 to 2,667 square feet consisting of 1 to 5 bedrooms, with 1 to 31/2 bathrooms. The firm has built and sold 3,274 home sections. The firm sells its homes under the brand name, Legacy. The company operates in 15 states through a network of 117 independent retailers and 11 Company-owned retail locations. Its Company-owned retail locations include nine Heritage Housing stores and two Tiny House Outlet stores.
